masterTrackingNumber.description:
Specifies the Master Tracking Number for the requested shipment.
Example: 997338100007320

serviceType.description:
Specifies the service type for this shipment.
Example: GROUND_HOME_DELIVERY
Click here to see Service Types

shipTimestamp.description:
Specifies the shipment date and time. The default timestamp is the current date-time. Format is MMM-dd-yyyy.
Example: 2019-10-04

completedTagDetail.description: Specifies the pickup confirmation and location details for the return tag shipment.

location.description:
Applicable for FedEx Express services.
Example: NQAA

dispatchDate.description:
The dispatch date for the FedEx Tag to be cancelled.
Example: 2019-08-03

alerts.description: Specifies the alerts received when a tag is created. This includes the alert code, alert type, and alert message.

code.description:
Specifies the API alert code.
Example: SHIP.RECIPIENT.POSTALCITY.MISMATCH

message.description:
Specifies the API alert message.
Example: Recipient Postal-City Mismatch.

items.description: These are alert details received in the response.

description: Specifies the output details when a tag is created.
